AngioWGD 1.0.2
  • Reference
  • Changelog

    Reference

    All functions

    add_iwgd_rects()

    Add interactive rectangles indicating WGD events in a phylogenetic tree

    add_wgd_rects()

    Add rectangles indicating WGD events in a phylogenetic tree

    available_clades

    Available clades that users can select from

    data_urls

    Data frame with URLs to original data (CDS and annotation) for each species

    get_nodepath_and_age()

    Get the node path from a tip of the tree to another node

    periods

    Period data from the International Commission on Stratigraphy (v2023/06)

    plot_age_distro()

    Plot a histogram and density line with posterior distributions of WGD ages

    plot_consensus_age_distro()

    Plot a histogram and density line with a consensus posterior distributions of WGD ages

    plot_itimetree_circular()

    Plot an interactive timetree for angiosperms in circular layout

    plot_itimetree_rectangular()

    Plot an interactive timetree for angiosperms in rectangular layout

    plot_timetree_circular()

    Plot a timetree for angiosperms in circular layout

    plot_timetree_rectangular()

    Plot a timetree for angiosperms in rectangular layout

    posterior_hist

    Pre-computed histogram statistics for posterior distributions of WGD ages

    run_app()

    Run the Shiny Application

    species_metadata

    Taxonomic information for all 466 species in tree

    subset_tree()

    Subset tree to include only a specific clade and outgroup

    subset_wgd_per_clade()

    Subset a data frame of WGD events to include only species in a clade

    tree

    Time-calibrated species tree for 466 angiosperm species

    wgd_dates

    WGD events and ages for all 466 species in tree
